title: My Pixel 4XL is stuck checking for data when transferring from my iPhone 6S+. How long does it take?
content:
I've been waiting 20 minutes on the checking for data screen while setting up my Pixel 4XL. It's connected to my old iPhone, but nothing seems to be happening? It I have a lot data on my old iPhone, something like 51GB, mostly photos and whatsapp, but transferring hasn't even started yet. 

Anyone know if something is wrong? Or how long it will take before I select the data I want to copy?
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 4 XL
